ygData.subject: RE: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Solusek goblins, mages, champions,shaman, etc.. all can see invis naturally. Soluseks are still blue to me at 32, and they ll always aggro on me if they
ygData.messageBody:
> FYI, I died a lot here at my current level 28 just trying to get to
> places.
> The shamans and wizards see invis and cast see invis on other mobs (I'm
> sure
> this has been mentioned before on this list, but it was a while back). I'm
> hoping at level 29 they won't aggro on me anymore, but not sure. I'm sure
> they don't aggro on level 30's.
>
Solusek goblins, mages, champions,shaman, etc.. all can see invis
naturally.

Soluseks are still blue to me at 32, and they'll always aggro on me
if they see me. At 32, I think young gobbies won't agro, but everything
else will, if they see you.
